page.title: 06A Day In My Life
page.content: I am 7 years old my name is Joanne Gregory and I live at Hartington station with mummy , daddy and brother william . my daddy is a peak park ranger and our house is next to the Tissington trail . I get up at 7 o' clock and get dressed. For breakfast I have sugar puffs or shreddies we go in the car to school which starts at 9 o' clock . My best friend is Kathryn Kirkham our favourite game is fairy bunnies at 12 o' clock I have dinner with the other children at school. I like sausages and chips . At 3 o' clock mummy comes to get me . When I get home I usually play . For tea I like haunted house spaggetti. On mondays I go to brownies . Sometimes I will go with daddy to look at the birds nests or other things on the trail . I like the gnewts and tadpoles In the horse trough . At 8 I go to bed
